Property.name: cancelText
Property.comment: The text to display on the cancel button

Property.name: dayNames
Property.comment: An array of textual day names which can be overriden for localization support (defaults to Date.dayNames)

Property.name: disabledDates
Property.comment: An array of 'dates' to disable, as strings. These strings will be used to build a dynamic regular expression so they are very powerful.

Property.name: disabledDatesRE
Property.comment: JavaScript regular expression used to disable a pattern of dates (defaults to null). The {@link #disabledDates} config will generate this regex internally, but if you specify disabledDatesRE it will take precedence over the disabledDates value.

Property.name: disabledDatesText
Property.comment: The tooltip text to display when the date falls on a disabled date (defaults to 'Disabled')

Property.name: disabledDays
Property.comment: An array of days to disable, 0-based. For example, [0, 6] disables Sunday and Saturday (defaults to null).

Property.name: disabledDaysText
Property.comment: The tooltip to display when the date falls on a disabled day (defaults to 'Disabled')

Property.name: format
Property.comment: The default date format string which can be overriden for localization support. The format must be valid according to {@link Date#parseDate} (defaults to 'm/d/y').

Property.name: maxDate
Property.comment: Maximum allowable date (JavaScript date object, defaults to null)

Property.name: maxText
Property.comment: The error text to display if the maxDate validation fails (defaults to 'This date is after the maximum date')

Property.name: minDate
Property.comment: Minimum allowable date (JavaScript date object, defaults to null)

Property.name: minText
Property.comment: The error text to display if the minDate validation fails (defaults to 'This date is before the minimum date')

Property.name: monthNames
Property.comment: An array of textual month names which can be overriden for localization support (defaults to Date.monthNames)

Property.name: monthYearText
Property.comment: The header month selector tooltip (defaults to 'Choose a month (Control+Up/Down to move years)')

Property.name: nextText
Property.comment: The next month navigation button tooltip (defaults to 'Next Month (Control+Right)')

Property.name: okText
Property.comment: The text to display on the ok button

Property.name: prevText
Property.comment: The previous month navigation button tooltip (defaults to 'Previous Month (Control+Left)')

Property.name: showToday
Property.comment: False to hide the footer area containing the Today button and disable the keyboard handler for spacebar that selects the current date (defaults to true).

Property.name: startDay
Property.comment: Day index at which the week should begin, 0-based (defaults to 0, which is Sunday)

Property.name: todayText
Property.comment: The text to display on the button that selects the current date (defaults to 'Today')

Property.name: todayTip
Property.comment: The tooltip to display for the button that selects the current date (defaults to '{current date} (Spacebar)')

Event.name: select
Event.comment: Fires when a date is selected
